content.text: table is designed to manage and store information related to manual billing schedules for utility companies. It includes details about the billing period, trip numbers, and meter reading dates, which are essential for generating manual bills. The table is structured to support the tracking and management of billing cycles and associated metadata, such as the user who authenticated the entry and timestamps for when records were added or last updated.

The complexity level of this table is considered medium due to its moderate number of columns, the presence of default values, and the use of user-defined functions for defaults. This table is used in the context of utility billing, specifically for managing manual billing schedules. Use cases include:
Scheduling and tracking manual billing cycles for utility companies.
Generating reports on billing periods and meter reading dates.
Auditing and verifying manual billing processes through user authentication and timestamps.
